column4: so no one know how to compile a module using the default haory kernel?
me neitrher but i KNOW there is a howto at the wiki
i just need to find the headers files for my `uname -r`
it was a such frustrating experience that i wiped all my remembers out of my head and branded it with a big shiny Z but i get that wikilink for you
btw, what chipset do you have?
ah, for me it was atmel
i don't know for sure. some old 10mbit chip build into a siemens usb device.
i dont need to compile a new kernel. i just need the kernel-headers for the hoary kernel so i can compile a module.
i get a list of available options and the message "You should explicitly select one to install."
